description: This file defines a React component named AppLayout, which provides the overall layout structure for the application's pages. It includes a header with navigation links, a main content area, and a footer. The component uses CSS Modules for styling and React Router for navigation.

methods.name: AppLayout
methods.description: React functional component that renders the application layout with a header, navigation, main content, and footer. Accepts optional 'title' prop to customize the header title.
